fields.name: diameterRatio
fields.desc: Relative ratio between this picker's height and the simulated cylinder's diameter.

fields.name: scrollController
fields.desc: A [FixedExtentScrollController] to read and control the current item, and to set the initial item.

fields.name: itemExtent
fields.desc: {@template flutter.cupertino.picker.itemExtent} The uniform height of all children.

fields.name: onSelectedItemChanged
fields.desc: An option callback when the currently centered item changes.

fields.name: childDelegate
fields.desc: A delegate that lazily instantiates children.

fields.name: selectionOverlay
fields.desc: A widget overlaid on the picker to highlight the currently selected entry.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of CupertinoPicker
desc: 【diameterRatio】 : Ratio of height to cylinder diameter   【double】
